title: The Band - A Musical History (5 CDs) (2005)
description:
This is the same torrent that was uploaded to Demonoid in December 2006.


The Band - A Musical History (5 CDs) (2005) [FLACs, some art]

Includes:
Files by track, ripped at FLAC 8. 102 songs in total.
Tags filled out.
Some artwork in jpgs: the CDs, the track listing (back), and the book's Table of Contents
Track Listing.nfo.txt
URL.txt

This does not include the 111 page book. Only the Table of Contents is included.
This does not include the DVD.

The set is a biography, tracing the group's career from their early days as the Hawks supporting Ronnie Hawkins, through their stint as Levon & the Hawks, through their time as Bob Dylan's backing band in 1966, through their emergence as the Band in 1968, then through their years of stardom in the early '70s, leading up to their departure at The Last Waltz in 1976. For a full discussion of this box set see the 

AllMusic.com page: <a href=" http://allmusic.com/cg/amg.dll?p=amg&sql=10:9yevadokw8wn~T1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://allmusic.com/cg/amg.dll?p=amg&sql=10:9yevadokw8wn~T1</a>
